simpara: The constants below are defined by this driver, and will only be available when the extension has been either compiled into PHP or dynamically loaded at runtime. In addition, these driver specific constants should only be used if you are using this driver. Using mysql specific attributes into the postgres driver may result in unexpected behaviour. You can use PDO::getAttribute to obtain the PDO_ATTR_DRIVER_NAME attribute to check the driver, if your code can run against multiple drivers.
